short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate lucky LottoMax numbers based on statistics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a statistics based lucky OLG's Lotto Max number generator that takes the following statistics into account:

1) Odds Vs. Even category
2) Most & Least frequent numbers according to 2023 draws (3,2,2 ratio) (3=Most frequent, 2 = Least frequent, 2 = others/wild card)
3) Most Common pairs


With this you will be able to pick numbers very easily without having to do the mathematics of all 2009 to 2023 statistics for Lotto Max. This avoids any beginner mistakes like picking a birthdate or significant dates which cuts off most of the numbers off.

Future updates will include 6/49 and the pick games.


Press Get lucky to get you a lucky number.

Our extension does not collect, store, or transmit any user data. All calculations and operations are performed locally within your browser.
